debit-card-textArea: We provide our own debit card for our users, making it as easy as possible for them to withdraw their hard earned money.
debit-card-crypto-description: YOU DESERVE EASY ACCESS TO YOUR MONEY
gs-card-title-two: Order your Debit card and pay the shipping fee
gs-card-description-two: We will deliver it to your home adress in 10-15 days
gs-card-title-third: Activate it at the nearest ATM
gs-card-description-third: Activation is simply by putting the card in the ATM and checking your balance.
